• Welcome to scMINER
  • Quick start with scMINER (local version)
  • Run clustering with MICA
  • PBMC(12k) scRNA-seq data

This site uses Just the Docs, a documentation theme for Jekyll.

scMINER tutorial

scMINER is a toolbox for single-cell analysis based on mutual information. This package is a combination of several individual tools including but not limit to MICA and MINIE. Separate installation of each individual tools is also available on github.

Get started now View it on GitHub

Getting started

Dependencies

scMINER is depend on python3 and R.

Local installation:

  1. Install scMINER:
#install dev_tool first install.packages(devtools)
devtools::install_github("jyyulab/scMINER")

Contributing
